RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 9, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGIC MOUNTAIN chased on the turn being carried out into upper stretch angling in from the eighth pole edging clear late. GEMO chased the pace saving ground to upper stretch vying inside of rivals the final eighth staying on to the wire. QUAD EIGHTS rushed out came in causing some traffic at the break making the lead setting the pace through the turn drifting out into upper stretch weakening late between horses. CHATTERMAN raced evenly angling four wide into upper stretch lacking a closing move there. RY'S REVENGE was never involved. BOO BE RIGHT was squeezed back at the break. BIG SAVER was in tight being bumped steadying at the break.

ENTRY.NAME: Chatterman
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide lacked late response

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside, carried out into lane, angled in edging clear

ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight bumped steadied break

ENTRY.NAME: Boo Be Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed back break

ENTRY.NAME: Quad Eights
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed out, led through the turn, drifted to lane, weakened,
